#sidebar Sidebar
#summary Installation overview
To install DD4T, you need to do 2 things:

 * [TemplateInstallation Install the DD4T templates in Tridion]
 * Create or modify your own web application
 
 Since DD4T supports both Java and .NET, there are separate instructions for the web application part:
 
 * [DotNetInstallation Setting up your .NET web application]
 * [JavaInstallation Setting up your java web application]
